TopicTitle: Space pirates, freighters, and a space combat force

Articles.Content:
This would be cool to create pirate ships, freighters and space combat force ships then let us fight with each other.

Another idea is racing space and land ships. 

Make it all separate from the other games just because others shouldn't  be forced into combat, unless they choose to. How cool would that be? Oh and add other species, like humans.

Thanks
